title: Ticket #7497: Custom machine resource docs should clearly state restrictions on name
description:
Since 8.9.4, per https://htcondor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktview?tn=7172, there are two restrictions on custom machine resource names: they must not start with an underscore, and they must be at least 2 characters long.

As far as I can tell, this is not documented anywhere except in the version history. It should be documented wherever CMR as a feature is documented (which I also can't seem to find...)
